description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Quickball is an exciting and physical new team sport.  The pace is fast and the rules are few.  Compete with any of the 24 teams to win the North American Quickball League championship.
description.short: Quickball is an exciting and physical new team sport.  The pace is fast and the rules are few.  Compete with any of the 24 teams to win the North American Quickball League championship.
